name: Horror House GB (early demo)
description:
A mini escape room for Game Boy (ghosts included)!

CONTROLS:

Arrow Keys to move

Z and X to interact

STORY (not fully fleshed out):

You had a nightmare. A hideous nightmare. There were ghosts, and keys, and locks, and puzzles, and...

It's ok now, you're awake. But wait, where are you?
